|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125:K; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6172; |cm_down_c = 16 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|defaulip = 10.0.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = HOME-XXXX-2.4, HOME-XXXX-5 |defaultssid_regex = ^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}-2.4$, ^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}-5$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Pegatron UPWL60281HP |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9381; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Pegatron UPWL6580 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9580; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== DOCSIS 3.0 16x4 The FCC external photos indicate that this cable modem is used with ''[[Comcast]]'''s ''Xfinity'' service.
Per the FCC internal photos... *the SoC used is an [[Intel Puma]] 6 *the GbE Switch is a [[Marvell]] 88E6172 *the RAM appears to be 2x ''Micron'' MT29F1G08ABADAWP *the DECT module is a ''DSP Group'' DCX81AC0BFAE3ENC (DCX81) *the MOCA module is a ''ViXS'' XConnex XC1030
The battery shown in the FCC external photos is a ''[[Pegatron]]'' ''PB013'' (Li-ion, 10.8V 2600mAh, 28Wh)
The FCC label shows the default SSID pattern is '''HOME-XXXX-2.4''' and '''HOME-XXXX-5'''
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.cisco.com/web/consumer/pdf/OL-29163-01.pdf Cisco Wireless Residential Voice Gateway User Guide] :[http://www.cisco.com/web/consumer/pdf/cisco_model_dpc3939_docsis_3.0_16x4_wireless_residential.pdf Cisco DPC3939 Data Sheet]
